numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Women love their parents more than men.
2. On average, women are more in touch with their parents than men.
3. On average, women contact their parents more than men.
4. I wonder why this trend exists.
5. Some people think that it is not cool for men to be in touch with their parents.
6. Some people think that it is not cool for men to check in on their parents.
7. This trend relates to my community.
8. Many people leave my home town for college.
9. Some parents in my home town worry about the safety of their children.
10. If men do not contact their parents, then their parents will worry more.
